name: LovelyGarden
description:
your daily plant-based meditation

Lovely Garden was created as part of the GamesAid Mental Health Jam as a meditation game. 

The idea was to create a simple mobile experience were you take care of a plant everyday and get to see the results of your efforts. There is no goal, no win, no lose. The only idea of the game is for you to take the time, even for a few seconds to take care of something, daily.

Whether you don't have the time or energy to meditate, lack the money to invest in a real plant, or just need a safe place to rest for a few minutes and witness the accomplishment of your work. Lovely Garden is here for you.
